thread.title: Gadam Kishan plays a key role in Jolly LLB remake
thread.title_full: Gadam Kishan plays a key role in Jolly LLB remake - The Times of India

author: Logesh Balachandran
title: Gadam Kishan plays a key role in Jolly LLB remake
text:
Gadam Kishan, who was last seen in Thirumanam Ennum Nikkah in the role of Jai's brother, will be playing a key role of an advocate in the Tamil remake of Award-winning Hindi film, Jolly LLB.
Talking about his role, Gadam Kishan says, "I play Udhayanidhi's friend in the film â€” the role of an advocate. It's an interesting character and as a comedian, I have a lot of scope in this film. I have already shot for my scenes in the film." He adds, "I am also currently working with Atharvaa in his next film, Rukkumani Vandi Varuthu, which is a comedy entertainer. I will be a part of all comedy sequences in that film. I am also a part of debutant Senthilvelan's upcoming film." Gadam Kishan, a Gadam player and a relative of Vikku Vinayakram, says, "I have plans to make my debut as a composer, too and I am looking for the right scripts now."
